resources.string: Provides guideline about the admission process in MNNIT.\n

Reached College..??
 On reaching college you will find three gates i.e. Ganga gate , saraswati gate and Yamuna gate
 1. Go to seminar hall. 
 2. Outside seminar hall there will be advocates , from whom you have to take different affidavits.
 3. Attested Documents will be verified.
 4. Deposit your academic fee draft and submit required documents there.
 5. Go to computer centre , where further formalities will be done.
 6. Congo on being registered. :)

Get admitted to college?Now its time to spend hostel life.
 So for the hostel, There are 7 Boys and 3 Girls hostels in our Institute out of which girls get KNGH and boys get Mega Hostel.

 For admission to hostel fill your hostel form provided at college website.
 1.)Go to your corresponding hostel.
 2.)Submit your draft of Rs. 15000 as mess fee.
 3.)Submit your hostel form along with it.
 4.)Room will be alloted.

1. Bring at least five passport size photos.
 2. Bring at least two copies of registration page.
 3. Bring your all academic certificates and at least three attested photo copies.
 4. Draft of college fees and draft of mess.
 5. Affidavit(can purchase in college premises also).
 6. Keep important stationary with u.
 7. Print out of forms given in college website.
